column4: GParted 0.5.1 on a Live CD: "Delete: Partition /dev/sda5 could not be deleted. Please umount all logical partitions having a number > 5." I umounted all of them but the message persists. How to proceed?
have you used the "mount" command to make sure they are all unmounted?
on the system itself, have you tried just running "mount" on a terminal?
you can check that by using the mount command in a terminal. just type mount to see what's mounted
and like Ikonia said, you delet 5, the rest go to
